page.title: 01PRINCIPAL FEATURES
page.content: The main{village}in our area is North Kelsey. It has a population of around 550 (1981 Census). The{hamlets}of Moortown and North Kelsey Moor are also situate in our block. The land is used mainly for agricultural purposes, namely cereal and sugar beet. A few farmers also have cattle and sheep. Our block is situated on the edge of the Lincolnshire Wolds, 8kms (5 miles) west of the{(Roman)}town of{Caistor. The village has 3 shops, a post office, 2 public houses, a Community Hall, a garage and a Primary School. There is also a Church and a Chapel. {
